subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Capriati has been off the WTA Tour for 18 months because of pain in her right shoulder that two operations have failed to alleviate.  It is difficult for Capriati who was once ranked No. 1 in the world.
snippet: Jennifer Capriati has been off the WTA Tour for 18 months because of pain in her right shoulder that two operations have failed to alleviate.  It is difficult for Capriati who was once ranked No. 1 in the world.
